function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Homeless people living in close quarters in shelters and motels","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Provide adequate space and ventilation in shelters, and ensure access to healthcare and testing","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, testing equipment, healthcare facilities","People":"Homeless individuals","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Drastic decline in public transit use and services","Impact":"Decreased access to transportation for essential travel, potential overcrowding on remaining transit options","Mitigation":"Increased sanitation and safety measures on public transit, promote alternative transportation methods","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, communication platforms for promoting alternative transport","People":"Public transit users, city residents","Owner":"Transit agencies, city governments"},{"Description":"Disruption in ride-share services and bike sharing","Impact":"Reduction in available transportation options, potential increase in private vehicle usage","Mitigation":"Support and promote alternative transportation methods, implement safety measures for bike sharing","Technologies":"Bike sharing technology, safety equipment, promotion platforms","People":"Ride-share users, bike share members, city residents","Owner":"Ride-share companies, city governments"}]}
